name: rtd
description: A set of build tasks with npm scripts.

scripts.uglify: mkdirp dist/js && uglifyjs src/js/common.js -m -o dist/js/common.js && uglifyjs src/js/common.js -m -c -o dist/js/common.min.js
scripts.build:css: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.build:js: npm run lint && npm run uglify
scripts.build:all: npm run clean && npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run imagemin && jekyll serve
